instruction: Design a virtual cooking class that includes a recipe eBook (text), cooking demonstration videos (video), and promotional materials (image, text). Explain how each element supports the overall class experience.
output-abstract: 1. Recipe eBook, 2. Demonstration Videos, 3. Promotional Materials.

Demonstration Videos: Record step-by-step cooking demonstrations for key recipes, ensuring clear visuals and instructions. 3. Promotional Materials: Develop eye-catching posters (image) and concise, compelling descriptions (text) to market the cooking class on social media and cooking forums.

instruction: Compose a tribute song for a famous artist that includes the music composition (audio), lyrics (text), a music video (video), and album artwork (image). Describe how each component tells part of the artist's story.
output-abstract: 1. Music, 2. Lyrics, 3. Music Video, 4. Album Artwork.
output-detail: 1. Music: Craft an instrumental that captures the essence of the artist's style. 2. Lyrics: Write lyrics that highlight significant moments in the artist's career and personal life. 3. Music Video: Create a narrative video that visually represents the song's lyrics and emotion, incorporating iconic motifs associated with the artist. 4. Album Artwork: Design artwork that reflects the artist's impact on the music industry, using symbolic imagery.

instruction: Develop an online art exhibition featuring digital art (image), artist interviews (video), a virtual gallery tour (video), and an interactive catalog (text, image). Outline how these elements combine to enhance viewer engagement.
output-abstract: 1. Digital Art, 2. Artist Interviews, 3. Gallery Tour, 4. Interactive Catalog.
output-detail: 1. Digital Art: Curate high-quality images of original digital artworks. 2. Artist Interviews: Record interviews with the artists discussing their inspirations and techniques. 3. Gallery Tour: Create a narrated video tour of the virtual gallery, showcasing how the artwork is displayed. 4. Interactive Catalog: Develop an online catalog that includes detailed descriptions of each piece (text) and images that viewers can click to view in high resolution.

instruction: Produce an educational podcast series on sustainable living that includes episode scripts (text), podcast recordings (audio), social media snippets (text, image), and an interactive website (text, image, video). Share how each component engages with the audience.
output-abstract: 1. Episode Scripts, 2. Podcast Recordings, 3. Social Media Snippets, 4. Interactive Website.
output-detail: 1. Episode Scripts: Draft engaging and informative scripts for each podcast episode, covering various aspects of sustainable living. 2. Podcast Recordings: Record clear and professional audio for each episode, incorporating expert interviews and practical tips. 3. Social Media Snippets: Create engaging posts and visuals for social media to promote each episode and encourage discussion. 4. Interactive Website: Design a website with episode guides (text), high-quality images, and embedded podcast episodes and related video content to provide a comprehensive resource on sustainable living.

instruction: Create a promotional campaign for a new tech gadget that includes a product description (text), a teaser video (video), press release (text), and concept art (image). Explain how these elements work together to generate buzz.
output-abstract: 1. Product Description, 2. Teaser Video, 3. Press Release, 4. Concept Art.
output-detail: 1. Product Description: Write a compelling and concise description of the gadget, focusing on its unique features and benefits. 2. Teaser Video: Produce a short, intriguing video that gives a sneak peek but leaves viewers wanting more. 3. Press Release: Draft a press release that details the gadget, its launch date, and why it's a must-have, targeting tech journalists and bloggers. 4. Concept Art: Design futuristic concept art that showcases the gadget's design and features, to be used in promotional materials.

instruction: Organize a virtual science fair that includes a call for submissions poster (image), participant guidelines (text), recorded project presentations (video), and a feedback mechanism (interactive text). Detail how these components facilitate the event.
output-abstract: 1. Call for Submissions Poster, 2. Participant Guidelines, 3. Project Presentations, 4. Feedback Mechanism.
output-detail: 1. Call for Submissions Poster: Design an eye-catching poster that provides essential information and generates interest among potential participants. 2. Participant Guidelines: Draft clear, comprehensive guidelines covering submission requirements, evaluation criteria, and presentation tips. 3. Project Presentations: Collect and organize recorded video presentations of each participant's project, ensuring they are accessible online. 4. Feedback Mechanism: Implement an interactive online platform where judges can leave constructive feedback on presentations and participants can respond or ask questions.

instruction: Develop a fantasy novel promotional package that includes a book cover design (image), book trailer (video), author biography (text), and audiobook samples (audio). Explicate how these elements attract and engage potential readers.
output-abstract: 1. Book Cover Design, 2. Book Trailer, 3. Author Biography, 4. Audiobook Samples.

Author Biography: Write a compelling biography of the author, highlighting past works and how personal experiences influence their writing. 4. Audiobook Samples: Provide short samples of the audiobook version, showcasing the narrator's ability to bring the story and its characters to life.

instruction: Create a multi-modal health and wellness guide that includes a weekly meal planner (text, image), workout videos (video), motivational podcasts (audio), and a progress tracking app (interactive text, image). Detail how these elements contribute to a holistic wellness plan.
output-abstract: 1. Weekly Meal Planner, 2. Workout Videos, 3. Motivational Podcasts, 4. Progress Tracking App.

Progress Tracking App: Design an app that allows users to track their meals, workouts, and overall progress, offering visual representations of their achievements and areas for improvement.

instruction: Plan a multi-city music tour that includes a tour schedule (text), venue highlight reels (video), promotional flyers (image), and a tour theme song (audio). Discuss how each component promotes the tour and enhances fan experience.

instruction: Create an educational webinar series on digital marketing that includes webinar slides (image, text), guest speaker recordings (video), a series workbook (text, image), and an interactive Q&A platform (text). Illustrate how these components provide a comprehensive learning experience.

instruction: Generate a historical documentary project that includes a research dossier (text), archival footage compilation (video), narrative voiceovers (audio), and a series of promotional posters (image). Explain how each element contributes to the storytelling.
output-abstract: 1. Research Dossier, 2. Archival Footage, 3. Narrative Voiceovers, 4. Promotional Posters.

Promotional Posters: Design a series of eye-catching posters that encapsulate the essence of the documentary, using imagery and text to attract potential viewers.

instruction: Design a virtual reality (VR) experience for historical education that includes a script for the narration (text), 3D models of historical artifacts (image), immersive environments (video), and background soundscapes (audio). Outline how these components interact to educate users.
output-abstract: 1. Script for Narration, 2. 3D Models of Artifacts, 3. Immersive Environments, 4. Background Soundscapes.

instruction: Produce a culinary travel show that includes destination guides (text), tasting adventure videos (video), local recipe features (text, image), and a show theme song (audio). Discuss how these components together create an immersive gastronomic journey.

instruction: Design a weather forecasting app that includes daily forecast summaries (text), weather pattern animations (video), radar images (image), and severe weather alerts (audio). Clarify how these features offer users a comprehensive weather update experience.
